idea: AVSN INFRASTRUCTURE PRIVATE LIMITED  is an integrated water infrastructure company with experience in design and construction of various projects in Drinking Water, Irrigation, Wastewater and Industrial Effluent Treatment sectors. AVSN offers clean water and waste water services from concept to commissioning. AVSN is serving the water infrastructure needs of India by helping it transition from century old canal based water distribution to piped irrigation network. We serve with equitable distribution of water for large and complex irrigation projects. Benefitting the farmers by increase in crop yield and reduced input cost with last mile availability of water in farm lands.
name: AVSN INFRASTRUCTURE PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: NOVOTA THERMOTECH PRIVATE LIMITED is the innovation expert in specialty functional coatings and technologies. We leverage our expertise on every project â€“ from initial planning to process application. Novota specializes in inorganic and polymer coating technology. We develop and produce coatings for a wide variety of industries. Because we understand that all coating applications are unique, Novota focuses on custom Coatings and out of box processes. We emphasize clear and consistent communication with clients in order to solve challenging technological problems. We pride ourselves on delivering quality and value. Novota is a versatile and responsive high-tech business, serving commercial OEM. We have worked with companies in the following industries: Power Transmission, Cement, Iron & Steel, Construction, etc. We have an exceptionally strong scientific and technical staff to help you develop your coating from concept through production.
name: NOVOTA THERMOTECH PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: KIT MART PRIVATE LIMITED  is a one-stop supermarket chain that aims to offer customers a wide range of basic home and personal products under one roof. KIT MART store stocks home utility products - including food, toiletries, beauty products, garments, kitchenware, bed and bath linen, home appliances and more - available at competitive prices that our customers appreciate. Our core objective is to offer customers good products at great value.
name: KIT MART PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
WEBSITENutraSphere is our brand of healthy foods and beverages infused with natural active ingredients. These ingredients are indigenous ingredients that have proven health benefits as per ayurveda and nutrition sciences. We curate these natural actives to create a unique blend for each product. So each product provides customers with a unique health benefit.

Our products look, feel, taste, and cost like FMCG products. But, they provide health benefits like nutrition products. We are working towards building India's first Fast Moving Healthy Goods company.

After starting up as a purely offline company distributing through nutritionists and doctors before COVID, we have now transformed into a digital company post covid. We are available on all major ecommerce platforms like amazon, flipkart and others. We are also available in a handful of stores across Goa, Mumbai, Indore and Kerala. Earlier this year we started our own website as well. We are also available on hyperlocal apps like bigbasket (Mumbai)

Customer reaction to our products has been extremely positive as our products allow them to infuse health into everyday life without making an effort.

We are now looking for funding opportunities to grow our marketing and sales teams.
name: ZANQUEST VENTURES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
LexBridge helps you simplify dispute resolution needs. It is our core belief that dispute resolution mechanisms need to be more efficient and more affordable to aid any business in achieving its goals / objectives than the processes which exists today. At LexBridge, we use technology to augment the dispute resolution process to ensure that it is both time and cost efficient. Whether your choice is to resort to arbitration or apply for mediation of your disputes, our experienced team will walk you through every step, taking care of any needs or issues you may have along the way.


Our team comprises of seasoned legal professionals who have worked on several high stake disputes pending before different fora, including judicial and quasi judicial authorities in India. LexBridge was founded at the helm of their experience with the dispute resolution process before courts in India. Due to the huge backlog of cases before courts in India, it is imperative that dispute resolution is simplified and made time bound to ensure that it supports businesses to flourish.


With LexBridge, we assure you can feel confident that your dispute will be resolved in a speedier and more efficient manner. Get in touch with us today to know more.
name: LexBridge

idea: ONE NETWORK CONSULTING PRIVATE LIMITED lis a eading solutions and System integrator for Network Infrastructure, Security, Cloud and IoT Solutions. we help organizations accelerate their digital transformation journey by offering System Integration, Managed Services & Distribution services in fast-growing domains of Cloud, Networking, Security and Internet of things through well- entrenched alliances with leading global technology OEMs.
name: ONE NETWORK CONSULTING PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
GO BACK TO YOUR TEENS AND TRY TO RECALL HOW MUCH CLARITY YOU HAD ABOUT WHAT YOU WANT TO BECOME IN LIFE OR IF YOU KNOW DID YOU HAD THE CORRECT ROADMAP OR SOMEONE TO GUIDE YOU TO REACH AND ACHIVE YOUR GOAL. 90% OF STUDENTS SUFFER FROM LACK OF GUIDANCE, SUPPORT, VISION AND WHAT NOT. idea:
Crushtech Engineering Services, a partnership company involved in the business of Operations & Maintenance services in Crushing, Sand Manufacturing, Dry Mix Mortar plants in India.

Apart from above, company also started manufacture of Sand Classifiers & Classified Sand Manufacturing plant in Thane.
name: CRUSHTECH ENGINEERING SERVICES
